ARABIC: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ هَلْ أَدُلُّكُمْ عَلَىٰ تِجَٰرَةٍ تُنجِيكُم مِّنْ عَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: You who have iman! shall I direct you to a transaction which will save you from a painful punishment?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: O you who believe, may I offer you a bargain which will save you from a painful punishment?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Believers, shall I direct you to a commerce that will deliver you from a grievous chastisement?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Believers, shall I show you a bargain which will save you from the painful torment?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: O People who Believe! Shall I show you a trade that can save you from the painful punishment?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: O you who believe! Shall I guide you to a trade that will save you from a painful torment
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: O you who believe! shall I lead you to a merchandise which may deliver you from a painful chastisement?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: O believers, shall I direct you to a commerce that shall deliver you from a painful chastisement?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: O ye who believe! Shall I show you a commerce that will save you from a painful doom?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Believers! Shall I guide you to a profitable course that will save you from a painful punishment?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: O ye who believe! shall direct you to a merchandise that will deliver you from a torment afflictive?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: O you who have faith! Shall I show you a deal that will deliver you from a painful punishment?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: O ye who believe! Shall I lead you to a bargain that will save you from a grievous Penalty?-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: O You who believe! Shall I guide you to a commerce that will save you from a painful torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Believers! Shall I direct you to a commerce that will save you from a painful punishment?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: O you who believe! Shall I inform you of a trade that will save you from a painful torment?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: O you who have believed, shall I guide you to a transaction that will save you from a painful punishment?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [61:10] O you who believe, shall I show you a commerce that will deliver you (read tunjīkum or tunajjīkum) from a painful chastisement? It is as if they had replied, ‘Yes’, so that He then says:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (0 ye who believe!) And He explained who they are at the beginning of the surah (Shall I show you a commerce that will save you from a painful doom) in the Hereafter?
